title: Low level team? I´m smurf
body:
Hi everyone! I´m from Latin america....I´m smurfing here in a search of a better community....by the moment bad experiences with other smurfs :/ you know ego people, aislated cases....
What I am looking for? Just for kind people to play, it doesn't matter if you are still "noob" , what it matters is that you already know some stuff...like....this is not call of duty, this is about towers, not kills....that enough for me, if you are new I can show you some tips and everything ;)
By the way I don't carry people, I believe that players carrys them selfs....So...ignoring the phrase from ranked that "you don't loose because your team, you loose because yourself" here in low level you know that everything is about teamwork and helping the other...you know....you are new, it doesn't matter that u make mistakes...but the idea is getting knowing that mistakes....
Also my english is a little bad....too many people said to me...but most of the time is my typing xD

Thanks for the listening....add me and we can play happily ;)

- Hadil Ramirez, All rounder, main top.{{champion:16}}

replies.body: If you don't mind I would like some pro advice. I'm in a very low elo at the moment and would like tips to improve my game. This account is my main, if you have spare time on your hands please PM me.

I taked a look at you match history and here is  a few tips:
-Play more normals or bots and focus on getting more farm, 10 minions means 1 kill, farm is an important fact of the game.
-Try to die less, number one priority of the game is not to die, then towers, then dragons and barons, then farm and then the kills...seems little hard to take, but with time u will learn to hold your self and don´t going over a 1v1 that u know u won't win
-Look in the internet for better objects, for the mages and ap for first item u can buy this ones {{item:3003}} {{item:3028}} {{item:3027}}  then u can buy stuff like this {{item:3157}} {{item:3089}}  For the tanki ones your base object is this one {{item:3068}}  ALWAYS CAPE OF FIRE IS LIFE...
-Use more broken champs easy to use like this ones: {{champion:103}} {{champion:69}} {{champion:122}} {{champion:55}} {{champion:89}} {{champion:106}} {{champion:238}} 
What else? Warding....but not much important to win....try to be alert in the map and always always use your trinket ;)

> [{quoted}](name=FilsofiaDeSimios,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=Z0PsE1Wg,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2015-06-06T19:11:55.651+0000)

thanks man
Please ignore rude people on this forum, I'll add you on my smurf.

thanks
